basic-info.Enter the info: Enter the primary contact details for this project. Additional contacts may be also added. Please note that these details will be publicly visible so do not enter in any details that should be kept private.
basic-info.Enter the names: Enter the names of all organizations and implementing partners that will be participating in this project.
basic-info.implementing-subtext: Organization(s) assisting in project implementation with funding provided by the appealing organizations
basic-info.Please enter a name: Please enter a name, brief description, and dates for this project.
basic-info.overview: Provide a brief overview of this project and its high level goals. This description will help donors and others understand the value of your project.
basic-info.name-subtitle: Please provide a short and succinct name, e.g. 'Food Assistance for Returnees in the South'
basic-info.summary-subtitle: Please provide a short summary of the intervention, describing its purpose and target
basic-info.org-subtitle: Organization(s) receiving primary funding for this project
basic-info.kobo-org-link: If you can't find the organization in the list, please inform us using this link

response-plan.Is this project: Is this project part of an existing response plan
response-plan.No: No, this project is not associated with a response plan
response-plan.Yes: Yes, this project has an associated response plan
response-plan.Remove data for clusters warning: Please note that this will remove all project target data for this cluster.
response-plan.clusters-hint: If unsure of which cluster/sector to select, please consult with relevant cluster/sector coordinators.

governing-entities.caseloadInstructions: Enter the target amounts for this cluster. If a metric or location is not applicable for this cluster, leave the target field blank.
governing-entities.select response plan: select the applicable response plan indicators and enter the corresponding disaggregation targets for this project

budget.description: Enter the total cost, line items, and allocations by cluster and organization for this project.
budget.agreeT&C: I understand that by submitting this project proposal my organization will be expected to report on funding received to the Financial Tracking Service (FTS, fts@un.org, or fts.unocha.org) on a regular basis for coordination purposes.
budget.must-add-up: Your budget lines must add up to your total project cost.
